messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 5502
messages.messageBody:
<<-=-I think
your analyzing too much. Just go with life and it will all fall into
place.-=-

The purpose of this list is to discuss what helps unschooling work better.
Advising against analysis might be good for a teaparty list, but not for
this one.

"Just go with life" is what most people do.
Parenting mindfully and making conscious choices based on principles isn't
quite as simple as just going with life. Some people just go with their
lives
and end up in prison.

Sandra>>

I think your referring to what I wrote.. "Telling them if they don't help
there won't be fun more often to be had
doesn't work. Kids think in the moment not ahead especially younger ones. I
think
your analyzing too much. Just go with life and it will all fall into
place."

I was talking about stressing over making them clean and comparing it to
other families not her whole post. Going with life as in not seeing it as a
failure every time life doesn't go according to plan.
In light of some recent comments I can see how what i wrote can be
misunderstood. My apologies for not being clearer.
Laura





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
